channel.title: Sex Offender Registery
channel.description:
You Have Commited A Very Serious Crime, as this is international it's is more serious than ever, this happened at Cairo, Egypt and your current Location is adress and post code We will be seeing you on the 12th of March at magistrates Court, my city. Yours Sincerely John Pecola, Australia From IP: MyIP
The sender was johnpecola1@yahoo.au, my mum didn't get one and I was 13 in cairo and now 14. I _want_ to think this is a hoax, but he has my house adress, my ip adress and I've been to cairo. Should I tell my mum?

@PaulT wrote:

find this mofo

Even the fabled Trackers of Morazun have difficulty finding carbon based life forms with the single clue being an email address.

KNAMSAYYIN!

item.title: Sex Offender Registery
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I removed my adress and my town, besides, no internet company should know I've been to Cairo.

To StarBlaster: I know people can get my IP and details from my IP even just by going to a site.
To deadlycow: I know the email should be professional.

It was in my junk folder so probally some mass message but it spooked me out.

Read full topic

item.title: Sex Offender Registery
item.dc:creator: @deadlycow21 deadlycow21
item.description:
@deadlycow21 wrote:

prob some pervert. if it was a real crime that you were getting the email for the email-adress would be more provesional- such as ... john.pecola@egypt.gov .... i wouldn't worry he probley doesn't really know all that stuff. plus, if it was real he wouldn't be showing off your address.

Read full topic

item.title: Sex Offender Registery
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

nowadays its pretty easy to get everyones postcode, address and IP, just by signing up to thing. Companies will give out all information they have on someone because it can earn them money, or they could have gotten the info if you have been on a site whivch tracks these things. Remember, people can get all your info from your IP address.

For now i wouldn't worry about it. If you get more, then tell your parents, and maybe even go to the police.

Read full topic

item.title: Sex Offender Registery
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

It must be some pedophile(sp?). Why would they guy contact you if you're only 14? If it was real he would have contacted your parents. I think you should just ignore the mail and if you get more of that sort tell your mum.

Read full topic
